name: Kadesh Welfare Society
briefDescription: The Organisation consists of 7 board members and 25 Pastors/elders from villages. The main objective of the organization is to Uplift the Orphans/down trodden rural children by providing them proper education and shelter. We have been running a Children home since 2009 for taking care of orphan/down trodden children. Presently, we take care of 15 children with more than 50 applications are pending in because of financial inability (so far the organization is running only with the support from its members).We also take care of Old people who need care and conduct adult literacy projects to Rural people. We also support poor people by providing free medicines for the needy. We also conduct theological upgradation programs for village Pastors.
